Uses of Package
neqsim.process.fielddevelopment.screening

Packages that use neqsim.process.fielddevelopment.screening
Package
Description
neqsim.process.fielddevelopment.evaluation
Concept evaluation and batch processing for field development.
neqsim.process.fielddevelopment.screening
Screening tools for flow assurance, safety, emissions, and economics.
neqsim.process.fielddevelopment.tieback
Tie-back analysis package for field development screening.
neqsim.process.fielddevelopment.workflow
Field development workflow orchestration.
  • Classes in neqsim.process.fielddevelopment.screening used by neqsim.process.fielddevelopment.evaluation

    Description
    EconomicsEstimator
    Economics estimator for concept-level CAPEX/OPEX screening in field development.

    Immutable report containing economics screening results.

    Emissions tracker for concept-level CO2 intensity estimation.
    EmissionsTracker.EmissionsReport
    Emissions report from screening.
    FlowAssuranceReport
    Detailed results from flow assurance screening.
    FlowAssuranceResult
    Result classification for flow assurance screening.
    FlowAssuranceScreener
    Flow assurance screener for rapid envelope-based assessment.
    SafetyReport
    Results from safety screening.
    SafetyReport.SafetyLevel
    Safety classification levels.
    SafetyScreener
    Safety screener for rapid assessment of safety-related design requirements.
